<Link id="l00027" /><CodeLine lineNumber="27" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/msf/msfbuilder"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">class </span><span class="doxyHighlight">MSFBuilder &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00028" /><CodeLine lineNumber="28"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">public</span><span class="doxyHighlight">:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00029" /><CodeLine lineNumber="29"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Create a new &#96;MSFBuilder&#96;.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00030" /><CodeLine lineNumber="30"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00031" /><CodeLine lineNumber="31"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// \\param BlockSize The internal block size used by the PDB file.  See</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00032" /><CodeLine lineNumber="32"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// isValidBlockSize() for a list of valid block sizes.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00033" /><CodeLine lineNumber="33"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00034" /><CodeLine lineNumber="34"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// \\param MinBlockCount Causes the builder to reserve up front space for</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00035" /><CodeLine lineNumber="35"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// at least &#96;MinBlockCount&#96; blocks.  This is useful when using &#96;MSFBuilder&#96;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00036" /><CodeLine lineNumber="36"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// to read an existing MSF that you want to write back out later.  The</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00037" /><CodeLine lineNumber="37"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// original MSF file&#39;s SuperBlock contains the exact number of blocks used</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00038" /><CodeLine lineNumber="38"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// by the file, so is a good hint as to how many blocks the new MSF file</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00039" /><CodeLine lineNumber="39"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// will contain.  Furthermore, it is actually necessary in this case.  To</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00040" /><CodeLine lineNumber="40"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// preserve stability of the file&#39;s layout, it is helpful to try to keep</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00041" /><CodeLine lineNumber="41"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// all streams mapped to their original block numbers.  To ensure that this</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00042" /><CodeLine lineNumber="42"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// is possible, space for all blocks must be allocated beforehand so that</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00043" /><CodeLine lineNumber="43"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// streams can be assigned to them.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00044" /><CodeLine lineNumber="44"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00045" /><CodeLine lineNumber="45"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// \\param CanGrow If true, any operation which results in an attempt to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00046" /><CodeLine lineNumber="46"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// locate a free block when all available blocks have been exhausted will</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00047" /><CodeLine lineNumber="47"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// allocate a new block, thereby growing the size of the final MSF file.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00048" /><CodeLine lineNumber="48"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// When false, any such attempt will result in an error.  This is especially</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00049" /><CodeLine lineNumber="49"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// useful in testing scenarios when you know your test isn&#39;t going to do</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00050" /><CodeLine lineNumber="50"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// anything to increase the size of the file, so having an Error returned if</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00051" /><CodeLine lineNumber="51"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// it were to happen would catch a programming error</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00052" /><CodeLine lineNumber="52"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00053" /><CodeLine lineNumber="53"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// \\returns an llvm::Error representing whether the operation succeeded or</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00054" /><CodeLine lineNumber="54"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// failed.  Currently the only way this can fail is if an invalid block size</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00055" /><CodeLine lineNumber="55"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// is specified, or &#96;MinBlockCount&#96; does not leave enough room for the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00056" /><CodeLine lineNumber="56"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// mandatory reserved blocks required by an MSF file.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00057" /><CodeLine lineNumber="57"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/expected">Expected&lt;MSFBuilder&gt;</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/msf/msfbuilder/#a8c21485958080726f29f691b4cbfcf00">create</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a8e612822d4ba7bb36c9c79582a567108">BumpPtrAllocator</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/regallocbasic-cpp/#ad5d00e1d77644d95847b9bf8da12b759">Allocator</a>,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00058" /><CodeLine lineNumber="58"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                     uint32&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/tarwriter-cpp/#aac035f4156e2604bfa42ba22c17b83ee">BlockSize</a>,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00059" /><CodeLine lineNumber="59"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                     uint32&#95;t MinBlockCount = 0,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00060" /><CodeLine lineNumber="60"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                     </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> CanGrow = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00061" /><CodeLine lineNumber="61"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00062" /><CodeLine lineNumber="62"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Request the block map to be at a specific block address.  This is useful</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00063" /><CodeLine lineNumber="63"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// when editing a MSF and you want the layout to be as stable as possible.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00064" /><CodeLine lineNumber="64"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/error">Error</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/msf/msfbuilder/#a1af64821af285e06f73d4f9bae60b68a">setBlockMapAddr</a>(uint32&#95;t Addr);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00065" /><CodeLine lineNumber="65"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/error">Error</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/msf/msfbuilder/#a3da93abaa67b0e96193734c8084fd3ce">setDirectoryBlocksHint</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef&lt;uint32&#95;t&gt;</a> DirBlocks);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00066" /><CodeLine lineNumber="66"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/msf/msfbuilder/#a81dc1a77bc37730b480a4156fd73acbf">setFreePageMap</a>(uint32&#95;t Fpm);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00067" /><CodeLine lineNumber="67"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/msf/msfbuilder/#af49f1e6ad306896b15614ee4c85dae63">setUnknown1</a>(uint32&#95;t Unk1);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00068" /><CodeLine lineNumber="68"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00069" /><CodeLine lineNumber="69"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Add a stream to the MSF file with the given size, occupying the given</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00070" /><CodeLine lineNumber="70"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// list of blocks.  This is useful when reading a MSF file and you want a</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00071" /><CodeLine lineNumber="71"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// particular stream to occupy the original set of blocks.  If the given</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00072" /><CodeLine lineNumber="72"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// blocks are already allocated, or if the number of blocks specified is</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00073" /><CodeLine lineNumber="73"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// incorrect for the given stream size, this function will return an Error.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00074" /><CodeLine lineNumber="74"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/expected">Expected&lt;uint32&#95;t&gt;</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/msf/msfbuilder/#af4a2024c4c2cee5d75b2146a5bc544d4">addStream</a>(uint32&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/inlineorder-cpp/#a7ee6f0cb51c3b9056199e9a0001fe8c3a6f6cb72d544962fa333e2e34ce64f719">Size</a>, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef&lt;uint32&#95;t&gt;</a> Blocks);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00075" /><CodeLine lineNumber="75"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00076" /><CodeLine lineNumber="76"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Add a stream to the MSF file with the given size, occupying any available</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00077" /><CodeLine lineNumber="77"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// blocks that the builder decides to use.  This is useful when building a</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00078" /><CodeLine lineNumber="78"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// new PDB file from scratch and you don&#39;t care what blocks a stream occupies</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00079" /><CodeLine lineNumber="79"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// but you just want it to work.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00080" /><CodeLine lineNumber="80"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/expected">Expected&lt;uint32&#95;t&gt;</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/msf/msfbuilder/#af4a2024c4c2cee5d75b2146a5bc544d4">addStream</a>(uint32&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/inlineorder-cpp/#a7ee6f0cb51c3b9056199e9a0001fe8c3a6f6cb72d544962fa333e2e34ce64f719">Size</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00081" /><CodeLine lineNumber="81"></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00083" /><CodeLine lineNumber="83"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// blocks as needed to match the requested size.  This can fail if &#96;CanGrow&#96;</span></CodeLine>
